title: error 004 patch 7.5
body:
hey, I basically tried everything - without success so far. Anyone can land a hand?
I've tried installing and uninstalling in lots of different ways, I updated registry stuff with ccleaner, tried using the tool "Hextech Repair Tool" and I've tried all of the options there, tried uninstalling, restarting, creating new user - Nothing gave me success so far.
What to do? Please I'm getting hopeless.
Any help would be appreciated.

replies.body: This error code is specific to the updated client, but the cause may be due to an unstable connection failing to reach our servers.  You'll want to run through each step of the [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to troubleshoot.  Reinstalling won't really solve a network problem in this case.  Let me know if you have any questions!
